appDesc.message: Faʻaleleia ChatGPT ma lautele/atoa/maualuga lau + spamblock auala. E galue foi i le perplexity.ai + poe.com!

helptip_fullerWins.message: Faʻagaoioia foi le Wide Screen pe a faʻagaoioia le Full-Window

helptip_widerChatbox.message: Faalauteleina le pusa talatalanoaga faalava i le Wide Screen mode

helptip_newChatBtn.message: Faaali atu le faamau talatalanoaga fou i le pusa talatalanoaga

helptip_hiddenFooter.message: Faʻasalaga i luga o le upega tafaʻilagi

helptip_btnAnimations.message: O faamau talatalanoaga animate i luga o hover

helptip_modeNotifs.message: Faaali atu faasilasilaga pe a toggling auala/faatulagaga

helptip_blockSpam.message: Hide spam fuʻa mai cluttering le itulau

helptip_pageSettings.message: Pulea le foliga vaaia o le itulau

helptip_chatbarSettings.message: Pulea le foliga o le chatbar

helptip_buttonSettings.message: Fetuunaiga faatulagaga e fesootai i faamau

helptip_perSite.message: i luga o le upega tafaʻilagi

alert_isUpToDate.message: o loo i ai i le taimi nei

alert_isOSS.message: o se polokalama tatala punaoa fausia ma tausia mo saoloto e ala i le 100% taumafaiga volenitia

alert_despiteAffliction.message: E ui lava ua matuā mafatia o ia

alert_byDonatingResults.message: e ala i le tuuina atu, e te fesoasoani ia te au e faaauau pea ona faaleleia, faaleleia bugs, faaopoopo foliga fou, ma faia le polokalama e sili atu

alert_noMatterSize.message: e tusa lava po o le a le tele

alert_directlySupports.message: lagolagoina saʻo aʻu taumafaiga e aunoa ma se totogi e mautinoa ai o lenei galuega faatino e tumau pea ona saoloto ma tatala mo tagata uma e faaaoga

alert_growTogether.message: Faatasi, e mafai ona tatou tausia lenei polokalama mamana tuputupu ae

alert_pressF11.message: Press F11 e alu i fafo le lau atoa

alert_f11reason.message: F11 na faʻaaogaina e ulufale ai i le atoa lau, ma ona o le saogalemu o le browser, e tatau ona faʻaaogaina le ki lava e tasi e alu ese ai
